name: The Grandiose Hotel
description: An exquisite stay awaits you at The Grandiose Hotel, where luxury meets comfort in the heart of academia.

packages.name: Luxury Weekend Getaway
packages.description: Indulge in a luxurious weekend retreat with spa access and gourmet dining.

packages.name: Business Executive Package
packages.description: Designed for the discerning business traveller, offering conference facilities and networking opportunities.

name: Seaside Escape Resort
description: Embrace the sea breeze and stunning views at our beachfront Seaside Escape Resort.

packages.name: Romantic Beachfront Package
packages.description: A romantic getaway with sunset beach walks and a candlelit dinner by the sea.

packages.name: Adventure Seekers' Special
packages.description: For those who crave adventure, try our watersports and outdoor activities.
